page.title: 04TEMPLETON GARAGE.
page.content: Tony Beeken owns a garage in Templeton on the Haverfordwest road.He has been running his garage for 23 years and works 12\ hours a day,6 days a week.He employs 3 full_time mechanics.He also has an apprentice. Tony started doing M.O.T.tests in 1980.He learned his trade in Central Garage in the small town of Narberth which is 2 miles from Templeton.He loves everything about his job and says "It's the best garage around".His favourite vehicles to repair are Ford cars.Tony said that the most difficult part of a vehicle to repair is the gearbox.He repairs almost any vehicle, such as tractors,cars,lorries etc.Mr. Beeken repairs about 80 to 100 vehicles in one week.
